subject: Remittance of Gratuity Contribution and other such statutory contributions sought by the parent departments of officers from State/Central PSUs on deputation to NHAI.
text: %an 72n TATT 91aetut TTM/Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (03a 9ar7 a 447a) 7744/ Fax 91-11-25093507 25093614 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) #-5 & 6, 0427-10, ERGT, 7Rev-110075 G-5 & 6, Secton-1O Dwarka New Delhi-710075 No 11014/11/2016-HR-[ 07.06.2017 Policy Matter 132.23/201Z (Decision taken on File No11019/1919/2014-Admn) Sub: Remittance of Gratuity Contribution and other such statutory contributions sought by the  parent departments of officers from State/Central PSUs on deputation to NHAI: It has been decided that NHAI shall remit the Gratuity Contribution and other such statutory contributions sought by the parent departments of officers from State/ Central PSUs on deputation to NHAI) as per mutually agreed terms and conditions of deputation 2 This will be applicable in case of present & future cases and no past cases will be opened on the basis of this decision: 3 This issues with approval of the Chairman: (A.K; Sadhu) Chief General Manager (Coord) To: All officers and employees of HQ/ROs/ PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices USTArf
